episodes.title: Ryan: That Is Not A Church, That is a Cult
episodes.description:
Escaping Religious Trauma: Ryan's Journey from Cult Abuse to Healing | Phoenix Effect Podcast

Join hosts Elle, Kristen, and Dennis on the Phoenix Effect podcast as they delve into the deeply moving story of Ryan, a storyteller and podcaster, who recounts his harrowing 11-year experience within a manipulative and abusive religious cult in Los Angeles. Ryan shares his journey from the initial allure and enticement of the cult, to the traumatic realization of its oppressive and isolating control tactics. The episode explores his transformation from a manipulated teenager subjected to spiritual abuse and isolation, to a self-aware adult dedicated to healing through storytelling and podcasting. Along the way, Ryan reflects on the importance of truth-telling, active listening, and reclaiming one's identity and faith in the aftermath of such experiences. Tune in for an in-depth discussion on the impact of religious trauma and the power of resilience and human spirit.
